mapper.select: select deposit_bigId, deposit_bigNumber, deposit_bigCardId, deposit_bigMoney, deposit_bigMoneyAndInter, deposit_bigBusName, deposit_bigInTime, deposit_bigLong, deposit_bigOutTime from js-deposit.deposit_big where deposit_bigId = #{depositBigid}

select deposit_bigId, deposit_bigNumber, deposit_bigCardId, deposit_bigMoney, deposit_bigMoneyAndInter, deposit_bigBusName, deposit_bigInTime, deposit_bigLong, deposit_bigOutTime from js-deposit.deposit_big limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into js-deposit.deposit_big(deposit_bigNumber, deposit_bigCardId, deposit_bigMoney, deposit_bigMoneyAndInter, deposit_bigBusName, deposit_bigInTime, deposit_bigLong, deposit_bigOutTime) values (#{depositBignumber}, #{depositBigcardid}, #{depositBigmoney}, #{depositBigmoneyandinter}, #{depositBigbusname}, #{depositBigintime}, #{depositBiglong}, #{depositBigouttime})
mapper.update:
update js-deposit.deposit_big
deposit_bigNumber = #{depositBignumber},
deposit_bigCardId = #{depositBigcardid},
deposit_bigMoney = #{depositBigmoney},
deposit_bigMoneyAndInter = #{depositBigmoneyandinter},
deposit_bigBusName = #{depositBigbusname},
deposit_bigInTime = #{depositBigintime},
deposit_bigLong = #{depositBiglong},
deposit_bigOutTime = #{depositBigouttime},
where deposit_bigId = #{depositBigid}
